channel.title: The system time?
channel.description: hi! what from java registrates the current time on your pc? i want to make something that sas when it's started, for that i need t know how you could read th current time on your pc so... does anybody knows wha that is?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 07:28:44 AM[/size][hr]nobody knows?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 08:06:22 AM[/size][hr]anybody?

item.title: The system time?
item.dc:creator: @zodi4k zodi4k
item.description:
@zodi4k wrote:

You can do it simple …

[code]
public int hour = 19; //hourtime 0 - 23
public int mins = 10; //mins 0 - 60
public int seconds = 50; //0 - 60
public int day = 5; //1-31

public void time() {
sendFrame126(" hour: “+hour+” “+mins+” “+seconds+” day: “+day+” ", LINENUMB);
if(seconds == 60) {
seconds = 0;
mins += 1;
if(mins == 60) {
seconds = 0;
mins = 0;
hour += 1;
if(hour == 24) {
hour = 0;
mins = 0;
seconds = 0;
day += 1;
if(day == 31) { //has to change every month 30 or 31days
day = 0; [/code]

Everytime you reset server you have to set it good yourself …
AND SO ON…

Its in milli secs im to bothered to calc myself // i think

Read full topic
